price: 98. Katakanlah (Muhammad), “Wahai Ahli Kitab! Mengapa kamu mengingkari ayat-ayat Allah, padahal Allah Maha Menyaksikan apa yang kamu kerjakan?”
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wal-lahu shahīdun ʿalā mā taʿmalūna
